name: SubstanceUseBehaviors
title: Substance Use Behaviors
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Substance Use Behaviors.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Substance Use Behaviors.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Substance Use Behaviors.)

contains.display: Substance Use Behavior [OMAHA]
Substance Use Behavior Family [OMAHA]
Substance Use Behavior Community [OMAHA]
Have you had blackouts or flashbacks as a result for drug use [SAMHSA]
Do you ever feel bad or guilty about your drug use [SAMHSA]
Have you neglected your family because of your use of drugs [SAMHSA]
Have you had medical problems as a result of your drug use [SAMHSA]
Report comment Narrative
Tobacco, Alcohol, Prescription medications, and other Substance use assessment [TAPS]
Smoked at least one cigarette containing tobacco in past 3 months
Smoked more than 10 cigarettes per day in past 3 months
Smoked cigarette within 30M after waking in past 3 months
At least one drink in past 3 months
Four or more drinks in one day in the past 3 months
Five or more drinks in one day in the past 3 months
Have you tried and failed to control, cut down or stop drinking in past 3 months [TAPS]
Has anyone expressed concern about your drinking in past 3 months [TAPS]
Used marijuana in past 3 months
Have you had a strong desire or urge to use marijuana at least once a week or more often in past 3 months [TAPS]
Has anyone expressed concern about your use of marijuana in past 3 months [TAPS]
Used cocaine, crack, or methamphetamine in past 3 months
Used cocaine, crack, or methamphetamine at least once a week in past 3 months
Has anyone expressed concern about your use of cocaine, crack, or methamphetamine (crystal meth) in past 3 months [TAPS]
Used heroin in past 3 months
Have you tried and failed to control, cut down or stop using heroin in past 3 months [TAPS]
Has anyone expressed concern about your use of heroin in past 3 months [TAPS]
Used prescription opiate pain reliever not as prescribed or not prescribed for you in past 3 months
Have you tried and failed to control, cut down or stop using an opiate pain reliever in past 3 months [TAPS]
Has anyone expressed concern about your use of an opiate pain reliever in past 3 months [TAPS]
Used medication for anxiety or sleep not as prescribed or not prescribed for you in past 3 months
Have you had a strong desire or urge to use medications for anxiety or sleep at least once a week or more often in past 3 months [TAPS]
Has anyone expressed concern about your use of medication for anxiety or sleep in past 3 months [TAPS]
Used medication for ADHD not as prescribed or not prescribed for you in past 3 months
Used medication for ADHD not as prescribed or not prescribed for you at least once a week in past 3 months
Has anyone expressed concern about your use of a medication for ADHD (for example, Adderall or Ritalin) in past 3 months [TAPS]
Used other illegal or recreational drug in past 3 months TAPS
Illegal or recreational drug(s) used in past 3 months
